backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing products, user profiles, purchases, admin‑gated product updates, and PDF uploads with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented admin‑dashboard‑related features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router defining routes for storefront, product details, admin dashboard, and buyer library with theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component showing an access‑denied message with optional details and a button back to the storefront.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDiagn: Admin diagnostics panel showing auth status, principal, admin checks, and product query state.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFil: Button triggering PDF file selection and emitting the selected file for upload.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, login handling, and admin‑state‑aware Admin button with loading, error, and unauthorized states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright, developer tools modal trigger, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapping all pages with a persistent header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product details, type badge, price, and link to product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting user for their name and submitting profile setup via mutation.
frontend/src/components/RequestUpdateMod: Developer tool modal allowing update requests, retry command copying, and deployment failure report generation.
frontend/src/components/SearchAndFilterB: Search bar component that updates the search query as the user types.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHero.t: Hero section with marketing text and hero image for the storefront.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for profiles, roles, admin checks, products, and product mutations using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with custom light/dark theme CSS variables and shared UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard handling product management, authentication checks, diagnostics, and dialogs for creating, editing, deleting, and uploading product files.
frontend/src/pages/BuyerLibraryPage.tsx: Displays purchased products and handles authenticated file downloads with error handling and UI feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single product’s details with purchase flow and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Storefront listing page with search, filtering, profile prompts, and product loading states.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentCommands.ts: Provides helper functions returning recommended deployment retry and diagnostic commands.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentFixSuggeste: Maps parsed deployment errors to specific fix suggestions with optional command snippets.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentLogParser.t: Parses raw deployment logs to extract the failing step and an error block.
frontend/src/utils/formatDeploymentRepor: Generates a formatted text report combining parsed deployment info and fix suggestions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, issues, and implemented features.
